Description: Gold finger-ring; hollow; in the form of a coiled serpent.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (949)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev Greville John Chester
